title: When you try to land skill shots on Katarina as Lux
body:
Freshly homemade meme

http://i.imgur.com/PdOsPjf.png

And you thought Fizz was annoying.

Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo 
Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo 
Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo 
Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo 
Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo 
Shunpo Shunpo  Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo 
Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo Shunpo

replies.body: But if you had Elementalist Lux, you wouldn't be making this post. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

> [{quoted}](name=Titz n Ashe,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8GNElNyO,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-12T18:25:53.712+0000)
>
> But if you had Elementalist Lux, you wouldn't be making this post. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Elementalist Lux? More like Invisible Lux
That was the joke.

> [{quoted}](name=Titz n Ashe,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8GNElNyO,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-12-12T18:33:12.358+0000)
>
> That was the joke.

http://mashable.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/Supernatural-Dean.gif
Upvoted for _Supernatural_ gif.
i don't understand the joke.. is there's something wrong with elementalist lux animations ? or a specific one?

> [{quoted}](name=RainbowIcee,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8GNElNyO,comment-id=000100000001,timestamp=2016-12-13T03:25:15.150+0000)
>
> i don't understand the joke.. is there's something wrong with elementalist lux animations ? or a specific one?

Basically what Ashe said, her Q particles go invisible at the last couple pixels, and her E is really hard to see (impossible to see on ARAM too).

The Elementalist Lux skin has some sketchy particles to her Q, which makes it hard to know when you're actually within the hitbox.

The joke is that Lux players can beat Katarina easier with this skin because of that.

Yes, she is quite the pain.

But it feels so _good_ predicting a Shunpo and dropping CC on a dagger just before she jumps to it.

https://www.taleas.com/images/memes/congratulations-you-played-yourself.png
Same thing goes double for having a LeBlanc get played with CC landing at her W return point as she does it.

What goes on in your mind when you throw a skillshot so obviously off, it's embarrassing, but then hits anyway.

> Umm... no one saw tha- PLANNED!

What goes on in the other guy's keyboard:

> \*spam rank, while dodging, only to find rank over one's dead body\*

What goes on in their mind:

> CAN'T TOUCH THI- ... I'll see myself out now.

Watching Lux fight any other champion.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7g77WN6obk4

Here's how it works for me

1. Know shunpoo range
2. See dagger in my minions
3. Kat changes direction to face dagger 
4. Cast spell at dagger
that kat is bad then
{{item:3100}} master race
I can't see why you wouldn't build that on kat.  Mana is wasted but the passive is so good.
Its not bad like 6th item, but it isn't better than ludens, you need zhonyas, gunblade is more damage/better spike early, and rabadons/voidstaff is more important.

I play other mid laners also, I like going lich bane on lux since you weave in autos to proc her passive its good against tanks and people who you cant land skillshots onlategame its like 700-800 magic damage per auto when your proc lux's passive I almost always build it 2nd unless they are getting magic resist then I will go void 2nd.

> [{quoted}](name=PROJECT Katarìna,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8GNElNyO,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2016-12-13T02:52:21.220+0000)
>
> I play other mid laners also, I like going lich bane on lux since you weave in autos to proc her passive its good against tanks and people who you cant land skillshots onlategame its like 700-800 magic damage per auto when your proc lux's passive I almost always build it 2nd unless they are getting magic resist then I will go void 2nd.

I haven't built Lich on her but it sounds cool, I usually never am close enough enemies late game to auto them/set off passive other than ult though.

I really like going hybrid runes though to make those auto attacks HURT
Lux has been one of my most played mages other than viktor twisted fate and ziggs
What happens when the Kat predicts your prediction and waits a half a second?
Predict that she'll predict your prediction and wait .6 seconds.
But what if she predicts that you'll predict her prediction? You have to wait 0.6 seconds.
I think she's actually easier for me to deal with after the rework because she's more predictable
aim for the daggers perhaps
URF kat is gonna be this.
I think I got the highscore as velkoz a couple games ago, but the other lanes fed hard and whackamole became irrelevant.

love it when people complain about elementalist lux being invisible. I mean get a new graphics card cause unless u have graphics on ultra there are quite a few champs that have invisible abilities.  Yes champions not just a 30$ skin

> [{quoted}](name=Squey,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8GNElNyO,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-12-12T19:59:22.268+0000)
>
> love it when people complain about elementalist lux being invisible. I mean get a new graphics card cause unless u have graphics on ultra there are quite a few champs that have invisible abilities.  Yes champions not just a 30$ skin

Well then theres the problem, because elementalist lux is a skin, and it technically buffs lux by making her projectiles less visible. If champions have invisible projectiles, then well thats not too bad because it's just a part of their base kit. If a skin gives you an advantage then there is a problem.

they will probobly fix the lux skin because it is known to offer an advantage. My complaint is other champs having abilities that cant be seen on lower graphic setting that wont get fixed. for example You can  not see ekkos animation of casting his stun bubble at all on the lowest settings. You dont know that he casted it unless you listen for it. Even on ultra you dont know where it will land.
i have had my graphics card on ultra and i still ban lux because her light particles are hard for me to see :C

> [{quoted}](name=Squey,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8GNElNyO,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-12-12T19:59:22.268+0000)
>
> love it when people complain about elementalist lux being invisible. I mean get a new graphics card cause unless u have graphics on ultra there are quite a few champs that have invisible abilities.  Yes champions not just a 30$ skin

Ever since Elementalist Lux came out, her win rate went way up.
yo kid some people don't have cash to buy a new graphics card... league is free to play and is meant for most toasters.

I have the benefit of raining both Kat and Lux, which gives me an _extremely_ slight advantage in this case, since I know a Kat player's mindset and can predict where they'll probably be in half a second.
